desc: Say goodbye to your frustration and light up our Roux Candle! Choosing a scented candle that is appropriate for your mood can make a huge difference. Our products are committed to being both zero-waste and Hand-poured in our very own little island of Singapore.

layout.text: We at Roux firmly believe in recycling and sustainability, and we encourage all our customers to re-use our husks.
Send them back, for a $5 off of your next purchase.
